verses.text: Behold my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, whom I \w uphold|strong="H8551"\w*; mine \w elect|strong="H0972"\w*, \add in whom\add* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w delighteth|strong="H7521"\w*; I have \w put|strong="H5414"\w* my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* upon him: he shall bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* to the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*.
He shall not \w cry|strong="H6817"\w*, nor lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, nor cause his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* to be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in the \w street|strong="H2351"\w*.

A \w bruised|strong="H7533"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* shall he not \w break|strong="H7665"\w*, and the \w smoking|strong="H3544"\w* \w flax|strong="H6594"\w* shall he not \w quench|strong="H3518"\w*: he shall bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* unto \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*.\f + \fr 42.3 \ft smoking: or, dimly burning\f*\f + \fr 42.3 \ft quench: Heb. quench it\f*

He shall not \w fail|strong="H3543"\w* nor be \w discouraged|strong="H7533"\w*, till he have \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* shall \w wait|strong="H3176"\w* for his \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.\f + \fr 42.4 \ft discouraged: Heb. broken\f*

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, he that \w created|strong="H1254"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and stretched them \w out|strong="H5186"\w*; he that spread \w forth|strong="H7554"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and that which cometh \w out|strong="H6631"\w* of it; he that \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \w breath|strong="H5397"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* upon it, and \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* to them that \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* therein:

I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thee in \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and will \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and will \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* thee, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee for a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, for a \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*;

To \w open|strong="H6491"\w* the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, to bring \w out|strong="H3318"\w* the \w prisoners|strong="H0616"\w* from the \w prison|strong="H4525"\w*, \add and\add* them that \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* in \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* out of the \w prison|strong="H3608"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: that \add is\add* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: and my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* will I not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to \w another|strong="H0312"\w*, neither my \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* to graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w*.

Behold, the former \w things|strong="H7223"\w* are come to \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*, and new \w things|strong="H2319"\w* do I \w declare|strong="H5046"\w*: before they spring \w forth|strong="H6779"\w* I \w tell|strong="H8085"\w* you of them.

\w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*, \add and\add* his \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* from the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, ye that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and all that is \w therein|strong="H4393"\w*; the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 42.10 \ft all…: Heb. the fulness thereof\f*

Let the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* and the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \add their voice\add*, the \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* \add that\add* \w Kedar|strong="H6938"\w* doth \w inhabit|strong="H3427"\w*: let the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* \w sing|strong="H7442"\w*, let them \w shout|strong="H6681"\w* from the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*.

Let them \w give|strong="H7760"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* his \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* in the \w islands|strong="H0339"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* as a mighty \w man|strong="H1368"\w*, he shall stir \w up|strong="H5782"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* like a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*: he shall \w cry|strong="H7321"\w*, yea, \w roar|strong="H6873"\w*; he shall \w prevail|strong="H1396"\w* against his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.\f + \fr 42.13 \ft prevail: or, behave himself mightily\f*

I have long \w time|strong="H5769"\w* holden my \w peace|strong="H2814"\w*; I have been \w still|strong="H2790"\w*, \add and\add* \w refrained|strong="H0662"\w* myself: \add now\add* will I \w cry|strong="H6463"\w* like a travailing \w woman|strong="H3205"\w*; I will \w destroy|strong="H5395"\w* and \w devour|strong="H7602"\w* at \w once|strong="H3162"\w*.\f + \fr 42.14 \ft devour: Heb. swallow, or, sup up\f*

I will make \w waste|strong="H2717"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* and \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, and dry \w up|strong="H3001"\w* all their \w herbs|strong="H6212"\w*; and I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w islands|strong="H0339"\w*, and I will dry \w up|strong="H3001"\w* the \w pools|strong="H0098"\w*.

And I will \w bring|strong="H3212"\w* the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* by a \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add that\add* they \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not; I will \w lead|strong="H1869"\w* them in \w paths|strong="H5410"\w* \add that\add* they have not \w known|strong="H3045"\w*: I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w darkness|strong="H4285"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, and crooked \w things|strong="H4625"\w* \w straight|strong="H4334"\w*. These \w things|strong="H1697"\w* will I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto them, and not \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* them.\f + \fr 42.16 \ft straight: Heb. into straightness\f*

¶ They shall be \w turned|strong="H5472"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w*, they shall be \w greatly|strong="H1322"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, that \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in graven \w images|strong="H6459"\w*, that \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to the molten \w images|strong="H4541"\w*, Ye \add are\add* our \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.
\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, ye \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w*; and \w look|strong="H5027"\w*, ye \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, that ye may \w see|strong="H7200"\w*.

Who \add is\add* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, but my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*? or \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w*, as my \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \add that\add* I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*? who \add is\add* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* as \add he that is\add* \w perfect|strong="H7999"\w*, and \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* as the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*?

\w Seeing|strong="H7200"\w* many \w things|strong="H7227"\w*, but thou \w observest|strong="H8104"\w* not; \w opening|strong="H6491"\w* the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, but he \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* not.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* is well \w pleased|strong="H2654"\w* for his \w righteousness’|strong="H6664"\w* sake; he will \w magnify|strong="H1431"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, and make \add it\add* \w honourable|strong="H0142"\w*.\f + \fr 42.21 \ft it: or, him\f*

But this \add is\add* a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w robbed|strong="H0962"\w* and \w spoiled|strong="H8154"\w*; \add they are\add* all of them \w snared|strong="H6351"\w* in \w holes|strong="H2352"\w*, and they are \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* in \w prison|strong="H3608"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*: they are for a \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*, and none \w delivereth|strong="H5337"\w*; for a \w spoil|strong="H4933"\w*, and none \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Restore|strong="H7725"\w*.\f + \fr 42.22 \ft they are all…: or, in snaring all the young men of them\f*\f + \fr 42.22 \ft for a spoil: Heb. a treading\f*

Who among you will give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* to this? \add who\add* will \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w* and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* for the time to \w come|strong="H0268"\w*?\f + \fr 42.23 \ft for…: Heb. for the after time?\f*

Who \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* for a \w spoil|strong="H4933"\w*, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to the \w robbers|strong="H0962"\w*? did not the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, he against \w whom|strong="H2098"\w* we have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*? for they \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* in his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, neither were they \w obedient|strong="H8085"\w* unto his \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

Therefore he hath \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* upon him the \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* of his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and the \w strength|strong="H5807"\w* of \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*: and it hath set him on \w fire|strong="H3857"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, yet he \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not; and it \w burned|strong="H1197"\w* him, yet he \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* not to \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.
